Viva la Vida was re-released on 25 November 2008 in a deluxe edition containing the original album and the Prospekt's March EP, which contained another hit, "Life in Technicolor II".

sentences.sentence: Live Free or Die Hard (released as Die Hard 4.0 outside North America) is a 2007 American action thriller film directed by Len Wiseman, and serves as the fourth installment in the Die Hard film series.
Live Free or Die Hard was released in the United States on June 27, 2007.
It is the only Die Hard film to be theatrically released with a PG-13 rating from the MPAA, although an unrated edition would later be made available on home media.
A fifth film, A Good Day to Die Hard, was released in 2013.
The film grossed $388 million worldwide, making it the highest-grossing installment in the Die Hard series.
